Posts.Content: May 4, 2013 06:11AM vt_lee wrote: How are you doing sfin? I got the "cliff notes version" of my biopsy results from the nurse yesterday - grade 3 mucinous/colloid invasive carcinoma. No other details yet - I meet with the surgeon on Monday when he returns from his conference.  I am relieved just to have an answer and I'm ready to start making a plan to fight this thing. Hope you are well - enjoy your weekend! ~Lee
Posts.Title: Waiting for Biopsy to be scheduled sfin lilithmoon

Posts.Content: May 4, 2013 01:24PM vt_lee wrote: Sorry it wasn't better news, Sharon, but also glad it wasn't worse! We will both nail this, just as Jocelyne and so many others have done before us!  I'm going to rest up, enjoy the weekend and face Monday head-on.  Thank you Jocelyne (and everyone else) for sharing your stories. They are an inspiration and something to strive for. I've never encountered a community of such strong women before!   ~Lee
Posts.Title: Waiting for Biopsy to be scheduled sfin lilithmoon

Posts.Content: May 2, 2013 05:14AM vt_lee wrote: Hi gals, thanks for sharing your stories! @sfin, I empathize with you. I too am awaiting news from a biopsy I had on Tuesday. My surgeon is at a conference for the remainder of the week, but he (thankfully) agreed to let his nurse call me with initial results and then I'll meet with him for a follow-up on Monday. They said I can expect to hear from the nurse either tomorrow or Friday. I hate this waiting game...
